verses.verse: Paul, <WG3972> an apostle <WG652> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> by the will <WG2307> of God, <WG2316> to the saints <WG40> which <WG3588> are at <WG1722> Ephesus, <WG2181> and to the faithful <WG4103> in Christ <WG5547> Jesus: <WG2424>
Grace <WG5485> be to you, and peace, <WG1515> from God <WG2316> our Father, <WG3962> and from the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>

Blessed <WG2128> be the God <WG2316> and Father <WG3962> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> who <WG3588> has blessed <WG2127> us with all <WG3956> spiritual <WG4152> blessings <WG2129> in heavenly <WG2032> places in Christ: <WG5547>

According <WG2531> as he has chosen <WG1586> us in him before <WG4253> the foundation <WG2602> of the world, <WG2889> that we should be holy <WG40> and without <WG299> blame <WG299> before <WG2714> him in love: <WG26>

Having predestinated <WG4309> us to the adoption <WG5206> of children <WG5206> by Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> to himself, <WG848> according <WG2596> to the good pleasure <WG2107> of his will, <WG2307>
To the praise <WG1868> of the glory <WG1391> of his grace, <WG5485> wherein <WG1722> <WG3757> he has made <WG5487> us accepted <WG5487> in the beloved. <WG25>
In whom <WG3739> we have <WG2192> redemption <WG629> through <WG1223> his blood, <WG129> the forgiveness <WG859> of sins, <WG3900> according <WG2596> to the riches <WG4149> of his grace; <WG5485>
Wherein <WG3757> he has abounded <WG4052> toward <WG1519> us in all <WG3956> wisdom <WG4678> and prudence; <WG5428>
Having made <WG1107> known <WG1107> to us the mystery <WG3466> of his will, <WG2307> according <WG2596> to his good pleasure <WG2107> which <WG3739> he has purposed <WG4388> in himself: <WG848>

That in the dispensation <WG3622> of the fullness <WG4138> of times <WG2540> he might gather <WG346> together <WG346> in one all <WG3956> things in Christ, <WG5547> both <WG5037> which <WG3588> are in heaven, <WG3772> and which <WG3588> are on <WG1909> earth; <WG1093> even in him:

In whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> we have <WG2192> obtained <WG2820> an inheritance, <WG2820> being predestinated <WG4309> according <WG2596> to the purpose <WG4286> of him who works <WG1754> all <WG3956> things after <WG2596> the counsel <WG1012> of his own <WG848> will: <WG2307>
That we should be to the praise <WG1868> of his glory, <WG1391> who <WG3588> first <WG4276> trusted <WG4276> in Christ. <WG5547>

In whom <WG3739> you also <WG2532> trusted, after that you heard <WG191> the word <WG4487> of truth, <WG225> the gospel <WG2098> of your <WG5216> salvation: <WG4991> in whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> after that you believed, <WG4100> you were sealed <WG4972> with that holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> of promise, <WG1860>
Which <WG3739> is the earnest <WG728> of our inheritance <WG2817> until <WG1519> the redemption <WG629> of the purchased <WG4047> possession, <WG4047> to the praise <WG1868> of his glory. <WG1391>
Why <WG1223> <WG5124> I also, <WG2504> after I heard <WG191> of your <WG5209> faith <WG4102> in the Lord <WG2962> Jesus, <WG2424> and love <WG26> to all <WG3956> the saints, <WG40>
Cease <WG3973> not to give thanks <WG2168> for you, making <WG4160> mention <WG3417> of you in my prayers; <WG4335>

That the God <WG2316> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> the Father <WG3962> of glory, <WG1391> may give <WG1325> to you the spirit <WG4151> of wisdom <WG4678> and revelation <WG602> in the knowledge <WG1922> of him:

The eyes <WG3788> of your <WG5216> understanding <WG1271> being enlightened; <WG5461> that you may know <WG1492> what <WG5101> is the hope <WG1680> of his calling, <WG2821> and what <WG5101> the riches <WG4149> of the glory <WG1391> of his inheritance <WG2817> in the saints, <WG40>

And what <WG5101> is the exceeding <WG5235> greatness <WG3174> of his power <WG1411> to us-ward <WG1519> <WG5209> who <WG3588> believe, <WG4100> according <WG2596> to the working <WG1753> of his mighty <WG2479> power, <WG2904>

Which <WG3739> he worked <WG1754> in Christ, <WG5547> when he raised <WG1453> him from the dead, <WG3498> and set <WG2523> him at <WG1722> his own <WG848> right <WG1188> hand in the heavenly <WG2032> places,

Far <WG5231> above <WG5231> all <WG3956> principality, <WG746> and power, <WG1849> and might, <WG1411> and dominion, <WG2963> and every <WG3956> name <WG3686> that is named, <WG3687> not only <WG3440> in this <WG3588> world, <WG165> but also <WG2532> in that which is to come: <WG3195>
And has put <WG5293> all <WG3956> things under <WG5259> his feet, <WG4228> and gave <WG1325> him to be the head <WG2776> over <WG5228> all <WG3956> things to the church, <WG1577>
Which <WG3748> is his body, <WG4983> the fullness <WG4138> of him that fills <WG4137> all <WG3956> in all. <WG3956>
